page.title: 06HOME LIFE IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: Home life is still important and is mainly well-integrated, 4 being the size of average family. Possibly the most important influences are radio and television, their catchphrases and ideas speedily assimilated into everyday life. Fitness and healthy catering are gaining in importance; and health foods are more popular. Where mother goes out to work, children have a main meal at school. Household appliances have reduced housecleaning time and meal preparation - frozen and convenience foods being widely used. There is considerable DIY activity and care for gardens. Families partake of indoor/outdoor sports and life is very full of activity. Houses are mainly centrally heated, double-glazed and supplied by both electricity and gas.
